freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign id>${row["id"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign alignment>${row["alignment"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign drugClinicalStudy>${row["drug_clinical_study"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign drugResistanceOfficialGuidance>${row["drug_resistance_official_guidance"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign variation>${row["variation"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug_resistance_clinical_finding "${id}" custom-table-row drug_resistance_clinical_finding "${id}" set link-target alignment "${alignment}" set link-target drug_clinical_study "${drugClinicalStudy}" set link-target drug_resistance_official_guidance "${drugResistanceOfficialGuidance}" set link-target variation "${variation}" exit </#list>
